name: Again.
description:
What’s the worst bit of Fallout 4? A contentious topic, but for me it’s ‘I have no idea what my character is about to say.’ 

 So we took that. And made a game. Because we are terrible.

  Enjoy the sensation of alcohol fueled brain mouth disconnect in an average, normal, totally non stressful situation.  Bomb defusal.  Drink to keep you stress down, and let loose the reins of destiny to your tongue.  

(For absolute immersion, get sloshed while you play. I personally recommend gin and tonic, screwdrivers, bellinis, Kinky pinky if you know how to make it, or Long Island iced tea for added difficulty.)   All the best, Cocktail Society.
